name: C.O.M.P.R.E.S.S.I.O.N.
description:
A gritty high-score scrap-tossing shooter taking heavy inspiration from Wall-e, Devil Daggers, Basketball, and Quake.

I didn't get everything in that I was hoping, but I'm proud of what I did! I hope you are able to enjoy it as much as I did making it!

Please let me know your thoughts and suggestions in the comments!

Credit:

Ilan B. - For the wicked thumbnail!
